generated.html:
Simple Example: Single table with a single schema

sequenceDiagram User->>Tableau: Open "Web Data Connector" (WDC) activate Tableau Tableau->>github.io: Load WDC github.io-->>Tableau: Web Form ("interactive Phase") Tableau->>User: Open form field(s) User->>Tableau: Form field(s) filled deactivate Tableau Tableau->>github.io: loading schema... github.io->>Tableau: schema loaded Tableau->>User: Load Data? User->>Tableau: Data Loading... Tableau->>github.io: Get Data ("Gather Data Phase") activate github.io github.io-->>CORS server: "GET" request CORS server->>Granicus API: CORS headers attached Granicus API->>CORS server: response CORS server-->>github.io: response github.io->>Tableau: JSON with schema deactivate github.io Tableau->>User: Table populated according to schema

See Tableau's Documentation for more detail
